Name: debugFlagReset
Desc:
Reset chapter-dependent event flags every time
the Intermission is saved and reloaded,
and set them to true.

WARNING: This will remove characters from the
roster that are obtained by hitting certain
event flags, like on-field Akyu/Lily Black/classic
Reimu & Marisa. Please be cautious when utilizing
this mod to test event flags by chapter.
